VIII.iv.2.D.5.e
.
Review of FPOW Rating Decisions Prior to Promulgation
The division manager or their appointed designee must review all rating decisions involving FPOWs prior to promulgation.
The review must ensure compliance with all laws, regulations, and directives affecting claims from FPOWs.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section D - Rating Claims Based on Former Prisoner of War (FPOW) Status
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section D
